meanings.definition: Professors: Teachers at a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The profs at the university are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent2: I have a meeting with the profs to discuss my research project.
meanings.sent3: The profs decided to have a picnic on the campus lawn.
meanings.sent4: The profs are the guiding stars for students on their academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The profs' dedication to education is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Profess: To declare openly or admit.
meanings.sent1: She will profess her love for him at the romantic dinner.
meanings.sent2: He decided to profess his guilt to the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The comedian will profess to be the funniest person in the room.
meanings.sent4: The singer will profess her emotions through her music.
meanings.sent5: The politician will profess his commitment to serving the community.
